lead_paragraph: Potential Democratic presidential contender Hillary Clinton said on Thursday she was pleased the U.S. Department of Justice was investigating the recent deaths of unarmed black men in incidents with police.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Backs Federal Probes of Ferguson, Staten Island Cases
headline.print_headline: Hillary Clinton Backs Federal Probes of Ferguson, Staten Island Cases

snippet: Potential Democratic presidential contender Hillary Clinton said on Thursday she was pleased the U.S. Department of Justice was investigating the recent deaths of unarmed black men in incidents with police....
